meanings.sent1: The stain was removed solventless, using only water and a cloth.
meanings.sent2: She cleaned the table solventless, avoiding any chemical cleaners.
meanings.sent3: The magician made the ink disappear solventless, without any tricks.
meanings.sent4: The artist's brush moved solventless across the canvas, creating a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The chef prepared the dish solventless, relying on natural flavors.

meanings.sent1: The solventless cleaner was safe for the environment.
meanings.sent2: I prefer using solventless products in my home.
meanings.sent3: The solventless paint dried quickly on the wall.
meanings.sent4: Her solventless approach to cleaning was both effective and eco-friendly.
meanings.sent5: The solventless formula was gentle on the skin.
